website_summaries.verdict: Beautiful, long-wearing liquid lipstick by a popular drugstore brand that feels as good as it looks. It also comes at a price that is just as appealing.
pros: Goes on easily and opaquely in one swipe and feels flexible when dry, even if you don't moisturize underneath with lip balm
Most colors are richly pigmented and last as long as 24 hours
From an affordable, trusted drugstore brand
cons: Can be flaky if you apply too many layers

customer_reviews.title: My Favoriteeeeee
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite lip color. I've used a few different shades and have been pleased with all of them. It stays on for a very long time and doesn't leave my lips feeling like they've been coated in gunk. It does dry your lips out a bit, but thats normal with long-wear lip products and is easily fixed with some chapstick after removing it in the evening. I'd also suggest to put this product on layer by layer. I hate when I can feel product on my lips, and making sure you give each thin layer a chance to dry before building up the color really helps with that. Pictured is Premier Plum, my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna L

customer_reviews.title: Serious? It's still working?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this lipstick for a few years. It seriously stays on for hours, usually all day! The downside, if you must know, is that it tends to dry up my lips.SO...I apply it, leave it alone for a couple of minutes, then apply a little lip balm. I also put lip balm on at bedtime, and the dryness is gone. I gave it 5 stars for keeping color on my lips all day!
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Stays on, perfectly. Reapply just once per day!
customer_reviews.text: YES, this is a good product. It goes on easily, looks natural, stays on for hours even while eating or drinking. Doesn't come off on anything. I stopped wearing lipstick for years but a colleague told me about this and I will definitely wear this every day. It is a little drying, so carry some lip balm to apply over it, but it's not irritating at all. Also not sticky once it dries. The Nude #1 color is very natural looking, a balanced pink/beige color. I am very fair but this would work for many different skin tones. I also bought the Iconic Iris color which is a little more pink but also very natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: I personally love this color and will continue purchasing it
customer_reviews.text: This particular color needs application a little more frequently than some of the other colorstays. However, I personally love this color and will continue purchasing it. Am able to wear it with oranges (peachy-orange) and pinks.
customer_reviews.author: Doogal's Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lip stains. I've tried every lip color, lip stick, lip gloss and lip balm on the planet and this is always the one I come back to. There's nothing better than being able to achieve a great log lasting color, putting a cherry Chapstick over it, and not transferring any of the color to your boyfriend's lips or shirt. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kari Elwell

customer_reviews.title: The very very best lip stain.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to. Great neutral red that goes with everything. Being warm-toned fair with dark hair, this works for me day or night. I think it’d be a perfect red for any warm skin tone, and possibly cool tones as well. Looks better with some gloss with color and sparkle, so it blurs the lines the dry formula creates, and isn’t so dry, but takes some trial and error to find one that doesn’t remove the lip stain. I’ve used all the lip stains and this stays on best without looking cakey. For me, through 3 meals and coffee and snacks, even oily.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Says

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: The color is good, and not shimmery as the photos suggest. However it DOES NOT stay nearly as well as Revlon ColorStay Overtime Lipcolor. It never gets AS dry as the lip color and peels by end of day. It's more easy on the lips than the other but doesn't stay as well. I tried this because I don't use the gloss part of the Lipcolor and expected this to fill my need. Unfortunately I'll be going back to the Lipcolor.
customer_reviews.author: FJ

customer_reviews.title: Great color and product
customer_reviews.text: I usually stick with my NYX Liquid Lipsticks, but I went out on a limb and tried the Revlon Royal Raisin for a change. This color not only looks amazing on the pale complexion, but it STAYS ON! After a few hours of wine and a dinner, my girlfriends kept commenting on how well my lipstick stayed on. They said it looked just as vibrant as when I showed up! It isn't too drying of the lips, but a little clear chapstick dabbed on any liquid lipstick after it dries does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JenacideByBibliophile

customer_reviews.title: My all time favorite red
customer_reviews.text: Honestly my all time favorite red lipstick. I buy it on here now two at a time because i can barely find this line at cvs or walgreens etc anymore. NO FAIL overtime i wear this lipstick I will get a compliment from anyone from the grocery store clerk to a random person in line at starbucks. seriously multiple people a day. I have countless MAC lipsticks (I am a makeup artist) including countless reds....this is my GO TO it does not bleed so I never have to worry that i smudged my lips or that they faded and i am starting to have that haggard wiped off just a little liner left look. ICK
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with this lip color
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this lip color! It is way better than the new craze--Lipsense! I have tried the Lipsense and for me, no way does it even come close to the Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Liquid Lipstick! The price is affordable for anyone. Only thing I would want different is more colors be made available! I already have almost one of every color that is available on the shelf! I need some browns, garnets would be nice too! I am obsessed! My addiction is Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Liquid Lipstick!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Vaseline has more color than this
customer_reviews.text: My lips are not super dark but for how the color appeared out of the the bottle, this went on and it looked like I wasn’t wearing lipstick. My husband said he just thought I had on a matte gloss as this really doesn’t show color. My nude lipsticks show much more color than this. Rubs off in the center leaving around the edges and last longer than regular lipstick but not as long as some other longer stay lipsticks I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaican

customer_reviews.title: Not my color, but the product is great
customer_reviews.text: This line of Revlon's Color Stay lipsticks is great. I'm sold on them. They keep my lipstick from creeping into my crypt keeper upper lip lines. I love them...get them. But this color "Nude" is too blah for me. I ordered more of a color I managed to find in stock and am waiting for it to arrive. If you like your lipstick to be nondescript, this color would work for you. At least it stays PUT
customer_reviews.author: Lompocwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best Red Lipstick I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. I have tried several different brands and color. I've even splurged for the LipSense and hated it. This is the perfect red. It goes on like a gloss and then dries matte. I have naturally mauve/plum lip color so a red lipstick is hard to find for my complexion, but this one is the BEST! It lasts for hours. I'd say more than 12 hours with one application; it is a bit drying (but most matte lipsticks are drying).
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Loudermilk

customer_reviews.title: I especially like Miracle Mauve because it's subtle
customer_reviews.text: Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Liquid Lipsticks are the the only lipsticks I wear. I especially like Miracle Mauve because it's subtle, and, in my opinion, on older women subtle is better than bright. Revlon's Liquid lipsticks stay on when I eat, drink, and swim. It can be removed with make-up removers.
customer_reviews.author: Susie the Swimmer

customer_reviews.title: Irritation and causes excessively dry lips.
customer_reviews.text: The color is very dark and very dry on your lips once color is set. Besides irritating my lips, the lipstick comes off in the middle of your lips but keeps a line around the contour. It looks like it was penciled in. Very very dissapointed the this ColorStay lipstick, others are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lipstick I use. This stuff really stays on. I can eat and drink without needing to reapply. The only thing that it comes off with is greasy foods. I have gotten many compliments on the shade. It applies nicely, dries quickly and doesn’t leave lipstick marks all over. My husband can actually kiss me without ruining my lipstick or wearing it himself. While it doesn’t moisturize my lips, it doesn’t dry them out either. Definitely worth trying if you don’t like having to constantly reapply your lipstick or worry that it’s worn off.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Herchick

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. The colors are magnificent and extremely long wearing. Just make sure you apply it to lips with NO residue. After eating I have to touch up the inner lip, but not much. Otherwise it’s great. No gloss needed. It’s designed to be worn plain. I won’t use anything else. I just wish it came in matte form.
customer_reviews.author: NmTrekker

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick that stays on
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite lipstick, I've been using for couple years. Tried others and always go back to this Revlon . I think they are trying to fade it out so I definitely would like warning when your getting low on product I just bought 4from you and I am very happy to get my color 025. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: TBirdie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite color ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a color I can wear for any occasion .. flattering but natural.. age appropriate for my senior face ! Lol A little dry , but I wear gloss on top
customer_reviews.author: Ellen s

customer_reviews.title: I've been on the hunt for the perfect Nude lip gloss/liquid lipstick (at least perfect for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for the perfect Nude lip gloss/liquid lipstick (at least perfect for my coloring/complexion). My favorite was a Neutrogena brand, that must've been discontinued. I've now tried a handful of different brands & colors, with no success. This Revlon in Buffest Beige, has the been the closest to the right nude color i've been searching for! My only complaint is that as it wears off, my lips feel sticky. I can deal with it though, for now, while I continue my hunt.
customer_reviews.author: ksc30

customer_reviews.title: Best Staying Power
customer_reviews.text: This is my daily color. I buy it online because CVS is too slow to restock it. The product is great and stays pretty much all day. If I go out at night, I might have to reapply it, but that's little to ask.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a great color!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick goes with everything! The color is amazing. that's the good news. The not great news is that it doesn't last nearly as long as other Revlon Color Stay lipsticks. It's also not very moisturizing. That said, I continue to buy it because the color is so great.
customer_reviews.author: VNN

customer_reviews.title: Best Lipstick Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick is great; I love the color, texture and durability. I put it on in the morning and it is still there at night; I never have to reapply. I am rather perplexed that at least one reviewer has mentioned sparkles because I have never noticed any (I've been using this brand for years!). Lipstick on teeth is also not a problem because once the lipstick sets (a minute at the most), it won't get on your teeth. It is true that it can get on teeth when first applied, but it rubs right off and is not a problem the rest of the day. The lipstick has a matte look, but does not dry out or flake.
customer_reviews.author: HarmonyGal

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: stays on and stays moist . this color was a little dark for me but if I put very little on it looks lighter I like a kind of rosy pink so tried premium pink and it is better I am fair with blond hair. I also used a clear glosser over after it dried works great.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best.
customer_reviews.text: I love this formula. It lasts from 8am to at least 7pm without a problem – make sure to let it dry before pressing your lips together to get the best wear. The consistency is very lightweight and doesn't dry my lips out at all. The color is perfect and has a slight glimmery, metallic hint to it that is really flattering. I have rather fair skin with neutral undertones and can see this being a great choice on anyone with medium to fair coloring. 5/5, one h*ckin' good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yuuki Saša Yaffe Segher

customer_reviews.title: ColorStay is the perfect long staying lipstick that out performs almost all others
customer_reviews.text: ColorStay is the perfect long staying lipstick that out performs almost all others. ColorStay is my favorite. I put it on in the a.m. and never think about it again. Sometimes I may want a touch up before going out in the evening. Lots of times I need just a light touch up the next morning. I am keeping my fingers crossed and wishing upon a star that Revelon does not change the formula or stop producing this lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyanna

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing amazing, 100% kiss proof
customer_reviews.text: Oh My God , It is amazing amazing , 100% kiss proof . It is Matt but light weight . I bought Nude #1 + Iconic Iris (I am in LOVE) with the Iconic Iris .
customer_reviews.author: Rima

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect color red for me! I’m also a fan of the formula..most of liquid lipsticks I’ve tried cause my lips to get so dry, but not this product. It doesn’t stay on my lips ALL day, but I only have to touch up for the afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: I don’t wear anything else
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lasts from the moment I put it on and needs to be removed at night after a full day at work. The color doesn’t fade, it dries on your lips quickly, doesn’t flake off. Honestly I love it. The color is flattering as well. Not too dark and just a small hint of purple to make it stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Fawkes

customer_reviews.title: 24 Hour Lipstick for Sure!
customer_reviews.text: Revlon ColorStay is the ONLY lipstick I use and the only one I've used for years now. I work in a very professional building and the last thing I have time to do is reapply my lipstick throughout the day, especially after I eat or drink. I apply at 7am and MUST remove it with a makeup remover or else it will still be there the next morning. I absolutely love this product and I refuse to use any other.
customer_reviews.author: AngR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade of red!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down my favorite lip stuff ever. It could withstand a rager in a hurricane, I swear. If you don't take your make-up off at night, you will still see it the next day. It doesn't dry your lips out like most so-called "long-lasting" lip color does, which is a HUGE plus. And it's the perfect shade of red, not too orange-y or anything. I'm very fair-skinned with darkish hair, and sometimes red lip colors look atrocious on me. But this one is perfect, and at the perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: B.Gerke

customer_reviews.title: Great all-day lipstick and perfect color
customer_reviews.text: I've used this color and product for a few years now. It's my go to. I don't have to reapply my lipstick during the day. Some people say they have problems with it drying out their lips. I haven't. I hope they keep making it because I will be really upset if it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: J48

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick! It’s very smooth and dries fast. My lips feel very soft and the color stays on almost all day I just need to reapply after meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lipstick I have ever had in my 77 yesrs. It stays on all day and doesn't cake.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting lip stain ever
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away by how long this product stays on !!!!! I put it on before bed to see the color and it was still on the next day !!! My only complaint is that the color isn’t quite what it shows on here. I thought it would be more pretty and pink and it had a slight orange tint to it
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I do wish it would have a little more moisture to it so as I didnt have to use lip balm also but all in all, I love this. I can finally wear lipstick again. I went years without it because every one I bought would bleed into my top lip and made me look VERY OLD! This stuff is great if you have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie89

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: color is perfect. Not too light, not too dark. Suitable for a date night as well as when you are feeling very confident at work. ;) Application is easy and dries matte immediately. Looks nontransferable (with a tissue test). Does not have weird smell unlike many other Revlon products.
customer_reviews.author: Mamta K

customer_reviews.title: Brillian bordeaux liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It's a very vampy dark burgandy red, it stains on forever! It leave a stain for a bit but works nicely with some balm over it. I had it stay on after 9 hrs of eating drinking and it was great no touch ups just some balm over it bc it can be a little drying. Make sure to work quickly with it as it dries matte pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: MHH

customer_reviews.title: I Only Use These Now
customer_reviews.text: These last forever and will be on the next day if not removed. They dry your lips, use a moisturizer a little while before applying. Put a balm or gloss over the top Matte appearance can appear dry otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jenford

customer_reviews.title: HATE
customer_reviews.text: I hate all shades of this. I ordered 2, and they might as well be the same shade. There's barely any difference. This stuff got all over my teeth and inside of my lips. It wasn't long lasting. It was overall horrible.
customer_reviews.author: camegna

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I buy A LOT of lip colour and I HATED this one. It goes on a lot like chalk. It is not moisturizing but just dry, clumpy colour that doesn't blend in well at all and does not stay. I feel bad I bought not just one but TWO of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deep mauve color
customer_reviews.text: Great deep mauve color. Durability varies-sometimes it last longs, other times it wears out in a 2-3 hours.. If you leave it on too long, it dries out your lips. I apply coconut oil to my lips to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Really flattering shade
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product the color is great I wouldn't call it moisturizing simply because it's a stay all day lip product and those are anything but moisturizing. does everything it's supposed to do and the color is pretty true
customer_reviews.author: Zac Jarva

customer_reviews.title: Go to lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I've used this lipstick for years, the shade is very flattering, the formula feels nice, it lasts most of the day, I don't have lipstick on my coffee cup, and the Amazon price is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Zehner

customer_reviews.title: Great stay-on-all-day lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Lipstick is back in and it seems like everyone is into the Senegence craze! I used to use Lipsense, and it is good stuff, but I prefer this Revlon lipstick. It looks like lipstick (not lip ink), seals my lips so that they stay moist, stays on all day (I reapply if I go out at night), and is much easier to remove than Lipsense. Besides it comes in smaller quantities so I can buy several colors and use them before they go bad. Premier Plum is my favorite every day color.
customer_reviews.author: dlovestojeepTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Only stays on about two hours. I'm used to the colorstay overtime, which stays all day. I assumed since outs called colorstay ultimate it would at least be as good? I never use the gloss, so thought it made sense to have more color product and no gloss. I'd return if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen N

customer_reviews.title: Like Elmers Glue with Red Coloring
customer_reviews.text: ICK! Goes on feeling sticky then dried to feel like glue on your lips. The color did stay on better than other lipsticks and balms, but I can't stand the cakey feel on my lips! I seriously wore it twice then tossed it. Save your cash. Try a different line.
customer_reviews.author: Creatress

customer_reviews.title: Nice nude lip color
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to long-lasting lip color. It is really a natural pinky-beige, and I add a touch of a darker color to get the perfect shade. I don't reapply unless I am going out at night, and I am completely happy with the wear. I use chapstick over the top, as it can be a bit dry. It adds a bit of color and evens out my lip color. I am not a fan of bright lips, so this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!
customer_reviews.text: I am done purchasing make up on amazon! This was awful. The color I got was supposed to be a purple and it looks like you are wearing clear lip gloss and it’s not a stain, it’s very sticky. Threw it away after trying it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn D

customer_reviews.title: My fave!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite color right now. It will last a good chunk of the day if I put on two coats in the morning. That is a must for me because I am a teacher and I do not have time to primp between classes. If I eat or drink a lot I will check it and it is often still fine.
customer_reviews.author: zoetica

customer_reviews.title: Best long lasting lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and I get so many compliments. I love how long it lasts, practically all day! It makes my lips feel dry but I don't care because I love the color and how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica White

customer_reviews.title: Stays for 8 hours, gorgeous red color, perfect by itself or as lipstick base.
customer_reviews.text: This lipcolor stays on for 8 hours and provides a great base for my lipsticks. I don't get the time to reapply again during the day, so when the lipstick wears off after a while the red color of the Top Tomato shade is still there on my lips. It can be drying so I apply a little gloss if I put it on without any other top coat. One of my go-to lipcolors for it's ease of application and staying power. I am on my 6th tube of this color right now. It's a staple.
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best long wearing lipsticks on the market. It doesn't get stick and dried out like other brands, although it does need a gloss (one from the same manufacturer that is made for long wearing lipsticks or it will come off).
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip color. Stays on all day through drinking coffee to having meals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All day all night
customer_reviews.text: This is the best color stay product for lips. I love it. I bought four colors. It's a goo sized tube lasts a long time on your lips and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Been using it for years now
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Been using it for years now. Just add any preferred moisturizer on top - like lip balm or gloss (because it tends to be dry), and you're good to go for hours, just adding gloss occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Maire

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for lips!!
customer_reviews.text: My go-to for lips! Love this stuff. Lasts forever on the lips and the tube lasts months, even with daily use. A++++
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyH

customer_reviews.title: Sticky sticky sticky
customer_reviews.text: YUCK.... couldn't keep my hair off my lips, this stuff is awfully sticky and definitely doesn't stay on long, I will NOT be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: This product stays on like no other lipstick. I have worn it for years and people always ask me, what is it you wear during your tennis matches that doesn't come off? Highly recommend to lipstick lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasts for hours!
customer_reviews.text: This lip color lasts for hours, even through eating or drinking! The tube contents will tend to dry out near the end, though, and will tend to crumble on your lips when it does. Just be warned you won't be able to use every last dreg from the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Gutsy Mama

customer_reviews.title: I love this product but not so much this particular color - not bad just not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I Love Love Love this product in the Nude color because it perfectly matches my natural lips. So I decided to try to this since a beige nude lip is very popular now. This is a little lighter than expected but beautiful and also an amazing highlight on my lower lip!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn ELKA

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not the first time that I'm buying this, I really like the quality and texture of it. Lasts for a long time, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: GGID

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and lasts long but you do need a gloss on top when it dries. I have Premium Pink. It’s a soft beautiful shade.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Krieger Chalaire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product in this color for years. Can't get this color in stores, so I buy it online. I apply once in the morning and sometimes after lunch. To remove, I use an oil-free eye make-up remover! I carry a little container of it in my purse so that if needed, I can start with a new coat after lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Others by Revlon are better...
customer_reviews.text: just not one of my favorites. I prefer the Revlon ColorStay Overtime Lipcolor, Longwearing Liquid Lipstick with Clear Lip Gloss, with Vitamin E, in Plum, 380 Always Sienna, 0.07 oz
customer_reviews.author: Monica Reuman

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying to find a lip stain that was long lasting and the perfect color i found this one and haven't looked back. The premier plum gives a pop of color without being too bold and is perfect for winter skin tones. The lip stain is a great base to add lip gloss or lipstick overtop or wear alone and it lasts for hours. This has been my go to now for the past 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip color!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite lip color, and I have been scraping the bottom of the bottle in order to get every last bit out while I have been looking for a new one. I can't find it in stores now, so I was delighted to be able to find it online. It's a slightly darker color, but by the end of the day, although much lighter, it still looks like I have color on my lips. It can be a bit drying, but nothing that little moisturizer can't fix. As long as they keep making this, I will keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best ever for your lips, lasts ALL DAY.
customer_reviews.text: I have natural pouty lips, thankfully Angelina Jolie made it so desirable. I'm picky with lipstick because whatever I use would get more attention than I want for my lips. But this brand is perfect. It applies easily, color pops up even with light application, stays on even when you eat or drink. Been using this for many years. Apply once and never have to re-touch the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: EMH

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the colour
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the colour! I'm not a big fan of the spongy applicator because it makes it difficult to apply with precision and with something that is going to semi-permanent this is going to be an issue so I apply this with a lip brush. I do find it can be a little drying so I recommend using a lip balm prior then dabbing it off then reapplying. Otherwise, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy it
customer_reviews.text: Lasts until i use makeup remover wipes to remove it. What a difference a bit of lipstain makes! Glad i found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: this has great staying power, although sometimes when I eat it comes off a little on the inside of my lips where my teeth and tongue kind of rub my lips a bit. It still looks ok when that happens. I keep this stuff on hand always.
customer_reviews.author: Tisus

customer_reviews.title: Lipcolor that stays on  at least 8 hours and doesn't dry lips
customer_reviews.text: No more lipstick stains on your teeth or drinking glass. Color stays true and you like you just applied it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Nedda Page

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lipstick - both brand and color. Put on in the morning and may need a touch up in the evening, but pretty rare. Some of this has to do with it being a lighter, neutral color. Not too bold. Very pretty. So permanent that I sometimes need to use coconut oil to remove it at night - this is rare - tends to be when I re-applied in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lipstick ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this lipstick for years And years and always get compliments on it. I only use Top Tomato and sometimes (most times) they are out of the color in the stores. So I have this sent to me monthly through Amazon. Having a monkey subscription makes shopping for this color obsolete
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Y. Craven

customer_reviews.title: Re-purchase of this item
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. Like the way it adds a little color and also keeps moisture in the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It really made your lips dry and it didn't stay that long
customer_reviews.text: Really did not like it make your lips dry and I didn't stay that long
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I am totally in love with these and have infact bought these in other ...
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with these and have infact bought these in other colours as well. You need to apply it only once, but it must be done properly especially the outlines ( I do not fancy a sloppy job ). The other great thing about these that you can lightly layer another lipstick on top of it, and that stays too. I added gold colored lipstick on top of 'top tomato' it looked brilliant and stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite — a long-wearing, true red
customer_reviews.text: I work an intense, tiring job and this lipstick stays fresh through long, grueling shifts!
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: Staying power!
customer_reviews.text: This liquid lipstick has staying power. It will stay on all day, through eating, etc. The only problem is that it is drying. For me, I can tolerate it because I don't have to keep reapplying it.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, slow delivery
customer_reviews.text: Like the moisturizing Colorstay but took forever to ship and be delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Hat finder

customer_reviews.title: Dark brown in color
customer_reviews.text: “Nude” is not the appropriate name for this color. It is brown in color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: application! no thick layers! drying is key
customer_reviews.text: Apply a thin layer then let it dry before applying another! This stays on! Yes it dulls a bit. But I wore it for 10 hours straight and my lips still have color on them
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy&Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shade that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this color looked on me. It’s not sticky and doesn’t require a top coat to keep it on. Lasts long and doesn’t make my lips crack.
customer_reviews.author: FindersKeepers

customer_reviews.title: Still love it.
customer_reviews.text: My most favoritest lipstick ever. Put it on in the morning and it still looks the same by the time I go to bed at night. I've been buying/wearing it for about two years now. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: dbpsyfi

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: the nude color is great, you can change its shade by using different lipliner color
customer_reviews.author: noor

customer_reviews.title: Fake product!!! Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product... it is a fake and when you try to return it , they tell you it is ineligible for return! I have been using this shade for over 10 years... what I got was a red hue not the wine color I always get...fake product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with this color
customer_reviews.text: I love the ColorStay lipsticks and have been using them for years. This particular item though seemed different - it was less creamy, didn't last as long, and when it would start wearing off it became kind of a pasty gray color. It seems like something is wrong with this color or the product has been modified somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Everyday color
customer_reviews.text: I have light colored lips and this is the best "natural" color. I use it by itself for everyday and under other non-long wearing lip products. Chanel had a color they discontinued several years ago and this is the closest I have found to replacing it. I do have to put gloss or chapstick on so it isn't too drying.
customer_reviews.author: SHM

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting but OH SO DRYING
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lipstick. I loved the color but I could not get past the fact it was drying my lips out so badly. Cannot really use it often bc of this.
customer_reviews.author: Lalalady

customer_reviews.title: It stays put all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST long wearing lipstick on the market. Doesn't get too sticky, and you can eat lunch AND dinner without having to touch up. Ridonkulous. Removes easily with baby oil.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of product!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars! I received this two days ago and the bottle barely has anything in it! A long bottle and it's basically dry. When I dip my brush, not much product goes on it.
customer_reviews.author: ShammyD

customer_reviews.title: Luscious
customer_reviews.text: So much easier ordering online. Perfect color I’ve been using this color for the last 10 years. Happy to order it so easily online. Came quickly and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Commisso

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered ultimate orchard and was very disappointed that the color was not even close to what it showed. I felt like a Barbie doll with fake 90’s pink lips. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Stays on all day through eating or drinking. Just add gloss every once in awhile. Touch up lightly if you're going out for the night. Great product...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J Sistad

customer_reviews.title: Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip stain! Lasts all day. Great color saturation. I hope I can continue purchasing it since I can't find it in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It’s stays on. I put it on in the am, and that’s it until sometime at night. Now, I have to put a good coat on; a little brush of the lips won’t fly. But a good coat and that’s it for the day. Truly wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of Four!

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time on my lips; great color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and that it stays on for a long time. It is kind of drying, but the lip sticks that moisturize never last very long on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color, longevity, and easy to remove!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and that it lasts 4-6 hours. Easy to remove!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Benefiel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Color is great. Can be layered for lighter or darker application. A little sticky, but wears at least 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A lipstick that does what it claims!
customer_reviews.text: Are you looking for a lipstick that doesn't bleed beyond your lip line? It's hard to find an all day rich color lipstick that stays where you put it! Well this one is the best on the market because I've tried all of them.
customer_reviews.author: bluffview

product_meta.title: Revlon ColorStay Ultimate Liquid Lipstick, Royal Raisin, 1 Count
product_meta.description: Color:ROYAL RAISINRevlon ColorStay Ultimate Liquid Lipstick delivers up to 24 hours of color in 1 step. Enjoy beautiful, food-proof, liquid lipcolor with no topcoat required. Look and feel beautiful in this liquid lipstick that stays on and gives you lightweight, comfortable wear with a soft satin finish. Available in a variety of full-color shades. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.
feature_bullets: Food-proof lip color with patented ColorStay technology
Available in 12 full-coverage, soft satin shades
